text_sample: <s> ### Instruction: Generate a one-sentence summary of this post. ### Input: Hello Reddit!    I was talking with my SO the other day and came up with this question. If the world was completely religionless, would the human race still have developed morals without the teachings of your own personal religion?    She argues that humans lack the ability to make "moral" decisions without a role model due to the chaotic nature of a human being.   I on the other hand believe that religion is just an easy example to base morals off of because of how prevalent it has been for the past 3,000+ years and was used to justify a world we didn't understand yet. Surely, with all the advancements in science and technology we would be capable of morals. Humans would have made justice eventually. So what does Reddit think?! ### Response: Would a world without religion be possible if moral laws were discovered through logic and reason instead of blind faith? What are your thoughts?!**  Thank you reddit for reading! Feel free to leave any questions or comments below!

<s> ### Instruction: Generate a one-sentence summary of this post. ### Input: So I´ve been thinking about this for some time, and I´m sure I want to break up. Over the last month I`ve just lost interest in my GF, she`s often negative and gets easily hurt/annoyed over small things.   Dont judge me on the following: Also, the girl I lost my virginity to is really into me and I`ve had a crush on her since I lost my virginity to her. She slept over recently and she´s going to sleep over on friday.  However, I dont want to mention this to my current gf as a reason for the break up. All in all I just want to break up without telling her a reason, but I know that would be unfair towards her.   How do I break it to her without coming of as a dick or anything? (Even though I am)  Also I think about doing it over the phone (calling her) concidering she lives an hour away and I can`t be bothered to travel 2 hours for a break up. ### Response: 17M wanting to break up with his gf(20)(without coming off as a dick), how do i come forth with such news as fairly as possible ? also considering shes an hour away. Phone call maybe ?

<s> ### Instruction: Generate a one-sentence summary of this post. ### Input: I'm starting to feel "restless" in the relationship, and since this is my first long-term deal, I'm worried that I'll either a. ignore the signs of being dissatisfied or b. become consumed by them.  I love him, and he is the sweetest and most amazing person, but I don't think there's really any passion. And when I think about that aspect, I don't feel excited, just kind of bleh. But this has been a recent development, and I might just be spiraling into a panic mode because I don't know if it's normal to feel so apathetic about someone at times.   I constantly fantasize about being with other people, both intimate and just in a casual, romantic way. But I've never found somebody that I've been more compatible with than him, so maybe I'm just being ridiculous.  We're so tied down together, in finances, and intertwined life, I might also be feeling a little trapped, like I couldn't leave if I wanted to. It took me awhile to feel comfortable with a commitment to begin with.  Am I just being selfish? I'm in something pretty damn perfect, but wondering if it could all be better.  I'm a bit overwhelmed, and feeling kind of crazy. Any advice from a third party would be appreciated! ### Response: 1 year relationship, recently developed apathy/feeling restless despite loving boyfriend. Worried i may miss out on passion due to unrealistic expectations/trapped mentality. Need outside perspective please! Help pl

<s> ### Instruction: Generate a one-sentence summary of this post. ### Input: About a month ago we started having problems with our cable. The picture would get pixelated (sp?) and the sound would cut out, couldn't control the menu via remote or anything. Did the usual, called TWC, had the support person reset my HD DVR box and it worked again...for five minutes. Called back, they did the same thing and it didn't fix the problem.  They sent a technician out to the house. He tried three new cable boxes, his own HDMI cables, my own HDMI cables and still wasn't able to resolve the problem. He finally resorted to hooking up component cables so we can still watch in HD, however, this has now produced a distracting feedback from my speakers due to all of the unnecessary wires.  I know there is not a problem with any of my hardware setup (the TV and Receiver work just fine and my ### Response: Time Warner Cable Box stopped displaying picture and sound, Technician tried everything suggested, is there anything that can be done to resolve this? Or am i stuck with these inferior component cables for the time being? Thanks! :)**

<s> ### Instruction: Generate a one-sentence summary of this post. ### Input: Some of the IPs it claims I have been logged in as are:  69.22.162.38	United States	15 days ago  69.22.162.31	United States	15 days ago  69.22.162.23	United States	15 days ago  64.212.198.70	United States	1 month ago  198.173.3.20	United States	1 month ago  206.57.29.76	United States	1 month ago  206.57.29.23	United States	1 month ago  64.212.198.69	United States	1 month ago  64.212.198.141	United States	1 month ago  None of these seem to be too worrisome (didn't check all of them) as they are not residential internet providors... however I am still curious as to why it looks like I am browsing reddit using those IPs.  Also i know the page says > Location information is guessed from your computer's IP address and may be wildly wrong, especially for visits from mobile devices.  And I do sometimes browse reddit from my phone using PULSE news reader... but I don't think I usually am logged in when on mobile.  What's happening here?  FYI: ### Response: I am logged in under several big-internet or CDN ips, including some that look like they could be residential.  Why?  How did they get those logs/info?  Is this normal/okay?

<s> ### Instruction: Generate a one-sentence summary of this post. ### Input: I posted this in /r/computers but thought I'd try here as well.  I have an XPS M1330 that has shat the bed like so many others with the NVidia chipset. No power, no nothing. The system is out of warranty, but I have been told that due to lawsuits etc, Dell will replace, not repair these units if you can get to the right person on the phone. The best option I have gotten from Dell so far is a $200 discount off a $500 repair. AFAIK these repairs often don't last 90 days before failing again. Are there any Redditors here in the know that can help facilitate a replacement for me? I used to be an L2 at Dell back in the day, but I know longer have any contacts on the inside. ### Response: 4 yr old XPS M1330 broken chipset. Dell wont replace unless under warranty. Looking for someone who knows someone still working @ Dell to arrange replacement. Help p ! :^

<s> ### Instruction: Generate a one-sentence summary of this post. ### Input: So as the title says she pierced her ears and it is something that I am extremely turned off by. Thing is she loves them and really wants to keep them, I don't want to have sex with her because I am so turned off but I do want her to be happy. Trying to be physically with someone with body piercing makes me feel like I am with a dead body. It is a wound that wouldn't heal as if the body was dead. Yeah i get it i sound stupid but there it is. I have told her how I feel and said I will try to change how I feel. I also told her that no matter what she decides I will support it and do my best to live with it, but she will have to deal with the consequences. I need help on how I can find a way to not be super turned off. Help please and thank you  edit: she has 5 in each ear. ### Response: girlfriend got her ears pierced I am super turned off, how can learn not to be?  EDIT: Just wanted to say thanks for all the replies. You guys are pretty cool. Any advice on how to make myself le

<s> ### Instruction: Generate a one-sentence summary of this post. ### Input: I'll start the story from last night. It was 11:44pm when I get a call from a "Blocked" number. I'm at a solid [5] from smoking trees so I decide to answer it. I get a "Hey Chris, it's Andrew. Know of any parties going on?". Baffled I respond "Andrew? I don't know any Andrews." almost right away I get a response, "You gave me your number last weekend." Now this is what scared me the most, because I didn't do jack shit last weekend or met anyone named Andrew. I ended up telling this guy that I didn't know of anything because of how sketch he seemed. ### Response: 11:44pm received call from blocked number with name Andrew. Didn't do jack shit last weekend and wasn't aware of any parties going on. Scared for safety/happy to not be involved

<s> ### Instruction: Generate a one-sentence summary of this post. ### Input: I(22) met a girl(23) last Summer, and we became really close on the run-up to Christmas. It's my first real relationship, although she's been engaged in the past. We get on great, and I've really fallen for her.  **The Problem**  She goes back to her country(France) in early April. Past this point, i know that i will only be able to see her once every few months. We both knew that it was a bad idea to get into a relationship, but i cant help how i feel for her.  I was just wondering if reddit could advise me on how to approach the next few months, and if there is any point in continuing the relationship at all. ### Response: 1st real relationship with girl who lives abroad - should i continue? How do i go about it? Any advice would be greatly appreciated! Thanks :) ! I(22 M) fell for a girl (23 F), and now

<s> ### Instruction: Generate a one-sentence summary of this post. ### Input: How can I help her?      My girlfriend's ex is constantly giving her hell, he's posting stuff about her all over the internet and spreading rumors about her.   We're in a long distance relationship so I've never met him I only know what he looks like from her pictures of him.   She constantly talks about things he's said to her and how he treated her, I hate talking about exes but it's not really something I can avoid entirely.   She said she's feeling ill about the things he has said but she refuses to tell me what he has said and where he has said it.   If you want any extra information ask in the comments.      We've been together for 6 months and they where together for 2 years so he probably knows more about her than I do. ### Response: Girlfriends ex is harassing her on the Internet and spreading lies about her. Want to help but don't know how. Need advice please! Asking in comments if anyone needs anything else. Thanks!**

<s> ### Instruction: Generate a one-sentence summary of this post. ### Input: Have been dating current boyfriend for 3 years and a couple months. He seems like he isnt interested in me.  For example not insinuating sex/ loosing it half way through. Not complimenting anymore. Started noticing it 2 months ago.I have gained like 10 pounds. But my weight fluctuates and i've been heavier. I work out 5 days a week. So im not fat by anymeans.  He said he still finds me attractive but the lack of sex happening seems to say otherwise.   Am i just boring now? Should I do something to change my look? Anybody out there had this happen? Help please! ### Response: 3 year relationship with declining interest from bf. What should I do? Did anybody else experience this? Help please!! :) Thank you!!!**  EDIT: Hes having trouble making time for me because hes working so much overtime

<s> ### Instruction: Generate a one-sentence summary of this post. ### Input: So, I've had a crush on this guy I met in high school for three years. He always flirts with me and goes out of his to catch up with me but has never asked me out. Because of that I have dated other guys and I just broke up with my ex a couple of days ago because I realized that I still have really strong feelings for this other guy. I hung out with this other guy today and I was going to tell him how I really feel but chickened out. I'm afraid telling him how I feel will scare him away. Should I tell him how I feel? ### Response: 18 year old female feels strongly for another guy after breaking up with her ex. Not sure if she should share her feelings with the other guy. What do i do? Help please! :^) <3 :) ;) :(

<s> ### Instruction: Generate a one-sentence summary of this post. ### Input: The other night I was leaving a bar with friends after a couple of drinks, when an argument between these two drunk girls started outside. They looked like your standard very attractive clubbing girls - tight, short dresses with a generous helping of makeup. Mix that with drunk, and they are the type of people I would normally avoid.  However, as we were walking past, it turned out that they were having a full-out brawl over their political differences. Talking about neoliberalism, they bandied around names like Adam Smith, John Rawls, Aristotle, Foucault etc. It was bizarre.  In the end, a crowd formed around them just watching them have this massive argument, that ended with slapping and hair pulling. The girls had to be separated. One girl started crying, while the other girl raised her arms in victory and yelled "AND THE WHITE CRUSADER WINS AGAIN!" (she was not white).  Is this an isolated incident? What are some of your unexpected and unique drunk stories? ### Response: 2 drunk girls got into a fight over neoliberalism at a bar. Which resulted in a huge crowd gathering around them to watch them fight. Was there anything similar happening to you? What's your best/most

<s> ### Instruction: Generate a one-sentence summary of this post. ### Input: Hot and steamy affair (known for 15 years, actual relationship approx 6 months+ long distance) quickly turns into love and promises of marriage and children. We both thought it was true love and we planned extensively for our future. We shared our deepest, darkest secrets with each other, among other things. Now, months after families are involved and things are publicly proclaimed, they are backing away. They cite the huge changes in their career and their justifiably related fear. They say they must focus on their job and can't have any distractions, for safety and sanity. Their concerns are legitimate. We face the next 3 years+ with little to no contact. SO is scared and wants me to move on, but doesn't want it to be over. They say they are mentally shutting down and I don't deserve this. Yet, they want to remain friends and not tell family and friends it's over. > ### Response: 20 year old male/female relationship ends abruptly due to career concerns and lack of support from families and close friends. They don't want it to be over and want me to move on. What should I do

<s> ### Instruction: Generate a one-sentence summary of this post. ### Input: Hi, I'm from California and my grandma has been in a sticky situation with her home.  A neighbor next door to my grandma was seeking reimbursement for repairs since there were holes in their house that came from my grandma's yard.  But it turns out the previous owner of my grandma's house caused those damages.   So after inspections and everything, the neighbor's insurance reimbursed him about $1600 to make the repairs.  Now's the sticky part: The insurance company's lawyers sent a letter to my grandma asking for reimbursement for what they paid the neighbor.   We've tried contacting our home insurance to deal with them but have been getting no calls back. We were thinking of writing a letter to OUR insurance company including the letter from the neighbor's lawyer and let them handle everything.  My grandma is just worried about losing the house. Thank you guys so much in advance. ### Response: Neighbor wants money from my grandma for repairs. Turns out it was the previous owner of my grandma's house that caused those damages. Neighbor's insurance paid the neighbor, and now want

<s> ### Instruction: Generate a one-sentence summary of this post. ### Input: let me just say that I love what you guys are doing and more power to you.  I come to you asking for some wisdom. My gf, who I have no problem with what so ever and love just the way she is, seems to be down on her self alot lately because of her weight. I personally haven't  noticed... sure her boobs are a little bigger and her butt got juicier.. but that's not really something that i frown upon. Well last night we were talking kind of heart to heart and she told me she had gained 20 lbs in the last 6 months...   Like I stated earlier, I did not notice at all. But I dont like seeing her down. I told her I would help her out with a diet plan (she just got a gym membership). So here I am asking you all for some help. I am personally a fit person, but it just comes naturally. I dont work out and i eat almost everything i want whenever i want and i keep a lean 175. Obviously I am the last person who should be giving diet tips. Can you all please leave some comments and let me know some of your tips/tricks? Or even a general plan to stick to... ### Response: GF has gained 20+lbs in past 6 months, need tips/trick to stay motivated/stick to diet plan. Please leave any questions or suggestions! Thanks!!!!! :)~~~*!

<s> ### Instruction: Generate a one-sentence summary of this post. ### Input: I (21f) have been dating my SO (26m) for a few months now, and I am sure he is the one. He is my best friend, my other half. We are both in recovery and this past weekend I was scared that he may have been using. I confronted him every time I suspected there was something going on, turns out I was just being paranoid. After spending three days upsetting him with my worry and distrust, I decided to sleepover to try and comfort eachother. I was feeling under the weather and took some Nyquil to go to bed, as I was drifting off to sleep, he had told me that he loved me, and I responded with "I love you too [different male name]"!!!! Wtf is wrong with me?! We had been talking about exes earlier that evening, but that is no excuse. For the record, the guy's name I said is someone who I do not associate with anymore. I love my this man, do you think we can move past this? ### Response: 21f called her boyfriend another man's name during a sleep over after weeks of being in a relationship, will it ruin our chance at a future together? Or can we get beyond this? What should I do next?

<s> ### Instruction: Generate a one-sentence summary of this post. ### Input: He accused me of this today out of nowhere. I'm completely shocked because I always ask him about what's he is doing or thinking about, how was his day... how's the game he's playing... He just gives me one worded answers and that's that.   I always encourage him to open up to me but he said it will take time so I left him be. He always asks me what I'm up to and I answer thoroughly because I'm talkative. He's a great listener btw. When we hang out he always asks me what I want to do... I tell him you can decide but he always says no it's up to me.  So he blew up today saying I don't care any of his interests. I came over last night and he played Fallout 4 while I watched. I had a good time, we even ended up having sex but after we were done he continued playing. He seemed fine... but now he's avoiding me after a series of angry text messages. He said I seemed bored when I was watching him play Fallout even tho I was so into it. ### Response: 5 months together, he accused me of not caring for any of his interests. I asked him what's he doing on his day and he blew up. Now he won't speak to me. What should I do?

<s> ### Instruction: Generate a one-sentence summary of this post. ### Input: In the past 10 months, I've had four bad encounters with four separate guys who all shared an extremely specific physical type.  I think this means that that type is "not meant for me".  (The four guys were not conventionally attractive men, and I think most women would be unattracted to their type, but for some reason, I was to it.)   I just got over the last of the four and had to sort of cold reboot my heart and loins to do it, so maybe because of that, right now I just don't find any guys at all, their faces, their bodies, or personalities, very interesting.    At the same time, I do need to get into a new guy, and do it now, in order to put the period at the end of Guy # 4's era and move on.  How are "types" decided for us, how do they form, and how do I find a new one?  Do we consciously decide what our type is?  If so, how do I do that?  And if not, what does decide it and how can I influence that process or speed it up? ### Response: 4 bad experiences w/same type; no interest in other males; need help finding new type that will attract me & allow me to function sexually again w/o being repulsed by it...how does this happen?!??

<s> ### Instruction: Generate a one-sentence summary of this post. ### Input: My boyfriend of almost a year has recently started having phases where he is in a bad mood and gets grumpy for a few days at a time. He keeps apologizing for it and says he just has a lot on his mind, and that he thinks he needs to get his life together. He is an honors student majoring in mechanical engineering at a prestigious university, so I'm not sure how his life could be more together.   I've noticed that these down phases he's had come after he does shrooms and I'm convinced they're making him think things about himself that aren't true (I don't know much about shrooms or any drugs really). I want to be there for him and help him feel better, but I don't want to come off preachy about how he shouldn't do drugs if he reacts that way to them.   I guess what I need help with is how to address this situation and how I can be a good friend to him. I'm a very straightforward person and generally not a very comforting person so I feel like I'm going to end up sounding like an inconsiderate asswipe by telling him to just stop doing drugs. It's also not really my place to tell him what to do with his life so there's that, too. ### Response: 1) Boyfriend gets into a bad mood after doing shrooms; 2) How do I talk to him about it without coming off as judgmental/preachy? 3) What kind of supportive actions should I

<s> ### Instruction: Generate a one-sentence summary of this post. ### Input: Over the past year I've grown in so many ways and learned so much about myself, love, and life in general. I want to commemorate my personal growth with another tattoo. A constant reminder of the new individual I've become and where I came from.   I want something small and in black and grey ink... possibly on my wrist or the back of my neck. I'm looking for some sort of symbol or image that represents growth, and despite it constantly being in the back of my mind for a couple of weeks I am still stuck.  Any and all ideas are welcome! ### Response: 1 year growth; need small tattoo idea representing growth (anything) despite having been stuck on it for two weeks - help please!! :) pls halp!!! :D thank you in advance! <3 ~love~

<s> ### Instruction: Generate a one-sentence summary of this post. ### Input: I live in a dorm and have a roommate, and I went home this past weekend. I got back this morning, and saw that my bed was arranged differently than how I left it. My roommate said he had a friend over, and that friend decided to just sleep in my bed. My roommate said that he was asleep when his friend got in my bed, so it's not really like he gave him permission, but he allowed it after he went ahead and got in.   I don't know this friend personally, I only hear stories, and I already know I don't fucking like them. It weirds me out either way that this happened without my knowing. Perhaps I'm overreacting to a lot of you, but it just feels like a personal violation, and I'm kind of pissed about it.   I told my roommate that that's not okay, and he just replied "Oh, well, alright." How should I handle this? I feel like I'm not done with the issue. ### Response: Roommate had a friend sleep in my bed while I was away from school for the weekend, I found out today upon returning. Uncomfortable feeling about whole situation. Need advice on how to deal/handle this type of

<s> ### Instruction: Generate a one-sentence summary of this post. ### Input: My girlfriend and I saw/heard a couple across the street fighting and then witnessed the man run into the house, begin assaulting the woman, and slam the door. Knowing there was at least one small child over there, we called 911. The cops came and took our info and statements but said they would contact if they needed anything. Fast forward a few weeks and we get summoned to testify against him in court.  We only called 911 because we feared for the safety of the kid(s). Only later did we find out the guy is a rumored drug dealer on probation. We really don't want to shit where we eat and we certainly don't want to fuck with drug dealers. Still, we don't want someone like this living across the street from us so we'd like to help put him away if we can. The letters we got say that if we don't show up, we can be "punished," but is this really true? Do we have the right to refuse to testify or to state our demands, for example that we do not want him to see who we are? ### Response: 911 called about domestic violence w/ children involved; now being subpoenaed to testify in court but don't want to put ourselves in danger + can be punished for refusing to testify...what are our

<s> ### Instruction: Generate a one-sentence summary of this post. ### Input: So, my boyfriend is having some issues with maintaining an erection and because of it we can't have sex. It goes soft as soon as I put a condom on him; I'm thinking that's the issue. I tried to do it quickly today so that maybe if he could just put it inside he'd be okay but as soon as I started to unravel the condom he went soft. I laid down beside him because I was a bit frustrated, but I just thought, we can try again later.  The poor fellow got really upset and started crying and wouldn't look at me. He said he was a failure and said "What kind of guy can't please his girlfriend?" I tried to reassure him and tell him it was fine, we'd figure something out, I don't need sex to like him...  He ended up going back to his dorm and won't text me back. I really want to help him.  What do I do? What should he do? ### Response: Boyfriend gets soft as soon as I put a condom on him and he thinks hes a massive failure. How do i convince him otherwise?! Help :( **UPDATE** A few hours after writing this, we had a long chat

<s> ### Instruction: Generate a one-sentence summary of this post. ### Input: I went up to my lake house with a few friends and I didn't tell my parents that we were going. Basically after coming back my dad asked me where I was, and I kept with my original story of going to my friends house. Obviously that didn't work out because my dad's friend saw me up there and said something to him. So now that I am caught in this lie, my parents are probably going to become way more strict, and not let me do things anymore.  I understand that I lied to them and that was wrong. But I think that they should understand that I'm a teenager and I'm gonna do mischievous things no matter what. My mom suggested that as a repercussion of my lie is to put a tracker on my phone, so that she could know where I am. I understand that it would be a trust issue if she didn't know where I was, but I think the phone tracker is just ridiculous and it's a huge invasion of privacy.  She seems pretty adamant about it, so I would have to give her a really good reason not to do it. Any ideas? Is it a good idea for me to be adamant about her not putting the tracker on my phone and just rebel against her? Or should I just try to come up with a reason for her not to track my phone? ### Response: 16 year old son got caught lying to parents about some thing he did without permission. Parents seem very upset, and want to place tracker on his phone. Son thinks this is an over reaction, and wants to fight it

<s> ### Instruction: Generate a one-sentence summary of this post. ### Input: So I was out with a friend going to get lunch when another close friend of mine (also his ex) called out to me when she saw me. They hadn't seen each other in years. I waved, then ended up turning around in her direction to go and say hi.  I was pretty conscious about making either of them feel uncomfortable or awkward, so I thought I would keep it quick, we said our hellos, then parted way (there was a bit of an awkward silence at the end).  I texted her casually later on saying "lol that was awkward" just to make light of the situation.  I then got a response back saying that it wasn't awkward at the start, but that I made it awkward. Apparently I just waved and walked away (I was admittidely unsure what to do at the start, but did go to say hi), and apparently I didn't look like i wanted to talk.  I tried to explain that I just wasn't sure how to deal with the situation, to not make either party uncomfortable. But now I'm getting ignored.   So is there anything that I should be doing in this situation? It seems pretty awkward no matter what.... ### Response: 2 friends bumped into eachother after many years apart; situation got awkward due to my actions, according to her. What can I do differently next time? Or am I perhaps overthinking things too much? Any advice would

<s> ### Instruction: Generate a one-sentence summary of this post. ### Input: So I know the owner of a small shop which manufactures some pretty cool things.  Now I have an idea that I feel would really sell a lot and I want to approach him about this.  I don't want to come off like a jerk selling him an idea, because he's a nice guy and I would also like him to make me one of these. However, I don't just want to hand over the idea and not have any compensation.  How do I approach him? Would you suggest trying to market it as a one-time idea or get paid a percentage per unit sold?  Or maybe just ask for a discount on some things in the store?  Should I just give the idea and hope he is nice enough to compensate me?  Thanks! ### Response: I have an awesome idea for a local business man that I feel like would sell a lot but don't want to just hand it over.  How can I get some compensation?  Maybe a percentage of each sale or something?

<s> ### Instruction: Generate a one-sentence summary of this post. ### Input: Hi all, pretty soon we will be taking our baby on a cross-country flight. He'll be 9 months old at the time we travel.  I've been asking others about flying with baby stuff, and I'm still confused.  We'll be flying a non-stop Frontier flight. We figure at the very least he needs a car seat, a stroller, possibly his infant carrier depending on how big he is by then, and a portable crib.   It sounds like we can check his stroller at the gate.  Is there a charge for that?  Frontier's website isn't clear. If he's still in an infant carrier, will they also check that at the gate? We are fine hold him on our lap during the flight.  And if he's too big for his infant carrier, does his "big kid" car seat go to the gate, or through baggage? What about the base?   Are there fees for that?  Do you recommend we bring our own pack and play and check it through baggage, or buy a uber cheap one from a place at our destination?    Thanks so much in advance.  Please don't be too angry at me if this is a repeat discussion.  I tried searching for similar discussions but couldn't find anything similar to these questions in the recent past. ### Response: 9 month old baby, what stuff do we need to get to our destination, carry on/gate checked/cheapo plastic baggie from Walmart type thing to check through baggage?  Any fees involved?

<s> ### Instruction: Generate a one-sentence summary of this post. ### Input: Throwaway  Long story short we've been together almost 5 years. I was her first. She was my second (had very brief sex in the 11th grade, mixed in with a few other sexual encounters of a similar nature). When we met she was not very sexual at all, and the sex was pretty terrible. The Sex has gotten much better ranging from ok to amazing in the last year or so. She has opened up sexually and we've benefited from it.  My fear however is that as we creep closer to possible marriage she'll want to 'explore' what its like having sex with other people. Shes never said this, and the only time its been brought up was her being upset with me because I had had sex prior to the relationship. She has a ton of intimacy issues and has said that thinking about having sex with other people makes her stomach hurts. I know most of this are my own insecurities, and I'm struggling to deal with them. I myself only got comfortable with the fact that she may be my only real sexual partner a few months ago. <s> ### Instruction: Generate a one-sentence summary of this post. ### Input: I've known him for a year and then some, and recently we've come out to each other that well.. we like each other. <s> ### Instruction: Generate a one-sentence summary of this post. ### Input: My boyfriend and I have been together for over a year. He's great, we always have a great time together. We are both really busy with our own lives (we don't live together) but we try to see one another 2 or 3 times a week.          I have noticed that I sometimes get really upset or annoyed when he chooses to spend his free time with other people. I don't get this way when we're both busy but if I have a night off for example and he does too, if he spends it hanging out with other people I get mad. I don't take it out in him & I don't think he knows I feel this way because I never mentioned it to him but sometimes it makes me mad at him for a few days. I know he is faithful and I don't question the kind of people he hangs out with girls or boys.          Can you please help me think of more constructive ways to deal with my frustration. I think I have tried both positive and negative reinforcement when it comes to us spending our days off together. When I think about it he is not doing anything wrong but I can't help feeling like this. I know I should try to fill that time with my friends but I can't always. Thank u ### Response: 1 Year relationship, I struggle to deal with my boyfriends "me time" which bothers me sometimes. Need advice on how to deal with this. <s> ### Instruction: Generate a one-sentence summary of this post. ### Input: Hey Reddit,  This is a question I have always wanted to get an anonymous opinion on. I was diagnosed with ADHD in elementary school and I am now in my twenties. I understand many people don't take ADHD seriously, and view it as an excuse for laziness and special treatment.  I believe it is over-diagnosed and my opinions are complicated regarding its categorization as a "disorder". My behaviors when it comes to getting things done are extremely abnormal, and I often wonder if it is beneficial or harmful to tell people about this diagnosis.  What I am asking you guys is: How does/would your opinion of someone change when they tell you they have ADHD? What if they are a close friend, employee, student, etc? Would you take them seriously or assume that they are making excuses?  Any thoughts on the issue are appreciated, I don't often get the chance to hear these opinions in person but I know that they exist. ### Response: 20 something male with ADD wondering what other peoples opinions would be if they told you they had it. Would you be more willing to take them seriously if they told you they had it? Or would you just think they were looking
